eh, it was worth a shot. but i didn't think it would, so i didn't give a 
descrip. but Assassin works to.

general descrip: 6 foot 1, favourite weapon is 2 Daggers, knows some basic 
spells (sleep, hold, charm and whatnot) prefers to work alone, wears 
enchanted boots of stealth. brown haired, brown eyed, medium build.

that a decent description?


---Original Message---
Dude, you've got some high hopes. Do you ever see ninjas in a fantasy novel? 
No. That's because most medieval fantasy novels launch from 12th century 
Europe. Ninjas come from Japan.
Now, are you talking the funny little japanese guys that run around in black 
clothing, with ninja stars and katanas and in general are amazing fighters, 
thieves and assassins?
If you want to be an assassin, (working for the Saervii or for Jakarta) I 
need a physical description, skills and a general attitude. If you can't 
give me more than a 1 sentence answer, I have to make one up.

-Trahern
